params.name: url
params.description: The URL to the server where the files are uploaded.

params.name: width
params.description: Width of the file upload control, in pixels.

params.name: title
params.description: Title for the upload dialog.

params.name: extensionfilter
params.description:
Use this attribute to specify the type of file that you will allow to be uploaded. 
For example, to let only image files to be uploaded, you can specify file extensions like .jpg, .jpeg, or .png

params.name: uploadbuttonlabel
params.description: Label of the Upload button.

params.name: progressbar
params.description: Whether to display Progress Bar or not. Default true

params.name: height
params.description: Height of the file upload control, in pixels.

params.name: maxUploadSize
params.description: The maximum file size, in mega bytes, allowed for the upload. Default 10MB.

params.name: maxFileSelect
params.description: The maximum number of files allowed for the upload.

params.name: style
params.description: A CSS style specification that defines layout styles

params.name: bgcolor
params.description: The background color for the file upload control. A hexadecimal value without "#" prefixed.

params.name: addButtonLabel
params.description: Label of the Add button

params.name: name
params.description: Name of the file upload component.

params.name: oncomplete
params.description: The JavaScript function to run after the file upload completes

params.name: onerror
params.description: The JavaScript function to run on an error condition. The error can be a network error or server-side error

params.name: clearButtonLabel
params.description: Label of the Clear button

params.name: deleteButtonLabel
params.description: Label of the Delete button

params.name: align
params.description: Specifies the default alignment

params.name: wmode
params.description: Specifies the absolute positioning and layering capabilities in your browser:

params.name: stopOnError
params.description:
Specifies whether or not to ignore the exceptions for this operation. When the value is
true, it stops uploading, displays an appropriate error

params.name: hideUploadButton
params.description: A Boolean value that specifies if the Upload button should appear in the media player

params.name: onUploadComplete
params.description: The JavaScript function to run after the all uploads have completed
